Utterance: Hi, Jessica, kemon acho?

Bhalo, bhalo.
Eta ektu help korchhe. Mone hochche ektu improvement hochche.

Ha. Na, ami bhul korechhi. Kintu tumi bolechhile, thik ache.

Tumi ki mone koro last time amra CBT kivabe kaj kore seta niye kotha bollam?

Tumi ki review korte chao session shuru korar age?
Ha, ha.

Thik ache. Eta kivabe kaj kore, mane kono situation ba event ghotechhe. Tumi ekta thought peyecho, thik ache. Ar last time toh tomar confidence er obhab chilo, mane tumi mone korechhile ami valo noi. Thik ache, eta toh tomar thought process chilo, tai na?
Ha.

Ar tarpor tumi ekta emotion anubhob koro. Last time tumi bolle je eta tomake nijer upor kharap lage, incompetent lage. Ar tarpor tumi behavior dekhao, jemon onno der upor rag koro ba nijer moddhe thako. Tumi ki mone koro eta bujhte parcho?
Ha, ha.

Toh ami jani last time amra tomar confidence er obhab niye kotha bollam. Mane, tumi bolle je tumi marijuana use korteo problem face korchho, depression niyeo problem aar anger issues niyeo. Eder moddhe kon jinish niye ajke discuss korte chao?
Hoi toh rage. Mone hochche eta amar biggest problem.

Mane, ami angry person noi, jemon kono light e snap kori na, kintu ami defensive hoi. Ami onek defensive. Ar ami lash out kori, kintu ami kokhono amar child er upor lash out kori ni. Sobsomoy amar husband er upor.

Amra groceries unload korchhilam, ar ami tokhon amar chul cut ar color korechhilam. Ami khub excited chhilam, bhabchhilam se bhalobasbe. Kintu se dekhe bollo, etar dam koto?
Ha, jinish gulo onek expensive hote pare.
Total, $60 hoto. Ar se bollo je amra money niye struggle korchhi, ar ami eto taka kharcha korte parbo na, selfish hote parbo na.
Thik ache, ekhon ami likhe niyechhi je amra kivabe family situation, thought, emotion niye kotha bollam. Mane, tumi bolle je event ba situation chhilo je tumi chul kete esechho, ar se rag korechhilo.
Ha. Se mean jinish bolchhilo.
Thik ache, thik ache. Ekhon tumi oi moment e, se mean bolchhilo, tumi ki bhabe feel korchhile, na, tumi ki actual thought chhilo je se sob kichhu bolchhilo?

Ami selfish. Se bollo ami selfish, thik ache? Ha, prothome. Ha, selfish, guilty, sad, angry. Khub angry je se amake feel korte baddho korechhilo. Ar tarpor se bollo, ar tarpor oi thought amar mathay dhuke gelo, ar ami angry hoye gelam.
Thik ache. Se je tumake rag korchhilo, ar bolchhilo tumi selfish, tumi nijer moddhe bhabcho ami selfish, ar tarpor angry hoye gelo. Tumi ki korle angry hoye?
Ha, smack.

Ha.

Umm

Hoi toh oi somoy ami mone korechhilam, kintu ekhon mone kori na. Se bolche amader taka niye problem ache, kintu asole nai. Amra bills metate parbo, ar ami jinish korte parbo. Se just ektu kanjoos. Amader enough taka ache, amra kono problem e nei. Ami confident feel kori, ami mone kori na ami selfish chhilam nijer ke sundor banate. Kintu ami mone kori manush er selfish tendencies thakte pare.
Toh ami shunte pachchi tumi mone koro na tumi ekdomi selfish.

Ha, mane, ami selfish actuation e achi, kintu jani na ami selfish ki na? Ami asole jani na. Jodi ami pura wardrobe kinlam, tahole hoi toh, kintu ami shudhu amar chul kete esechhi. Ar se ekta boro bari bechechhilo oi saptah, tai amader enough taka chhilo amar afford korte.

Thik ache. Toh tumi ki bhabe behave korbe?
Chole jabo, thik ache, othoba ami suppress korte parbo. Eta ami chai, ami realize kori se deserve kore ni ami or upor haat tulte. Se kichhu bollo je ami upset hoyechhi, kintu keu deserve kore na.

Thik ache. Toh hoi toh ami selfish mone korte parbo na jokhon se amar upor rag kore. Tumi ki mone koro tumi nijer kache bolte paro, se bujhte pare ni, ar ami explain korte parbo ami deserve kori. Eta amake valo feel korate sahajjo kore.
